product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Light Packcover - Small
long_description: Add this to your 10 Essentials list! During iffy weather, this ultra-lightweight packcover keeps lunch and essentials protected from the elements. Siliconized Cordura(R) nylon cover keeps your pack and, therefore, your clothes, sleeping bag and gear protected from the elements. Siliconized nylon is highly rip and tear resistant; the fibers stretch under pressure instead of locking together and tearing. Seamless construction for weather-tight protection. Siliconized nylon mini stuff sack attaches to packcover so it won't get lost. Mid-back keeper strap helps secure cover to the pack and keep the sides from catching wind.
short_description: Add this to your 10 Essentials list! During iffy weather, this ultra-lightweight packcover keeps lunch and essentials protected from the elements.
